price: 你的主必为他所意欲者而使给养富裕，必为他所意欲者而使给养窘迫。你的主对于他的众仆，确是彻知的，确是明察的。
arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرَۢا بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna rabbaka yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu wayaqdiru innahu kāna biʿibādihi khabīran baṣīran
